parts: I'm a senior engineer at Sun Microsystems making $185k base plus RSUs. My manager Dave Chen approved my transfer to the Platform team last month. Can you help me update my resume?
I'd be happy to help you update your resume.
My psychiatrist Dr. Patel at Mass General just diagnosed me with ADHD and prescribed 20mg Adderall XR. I'm also on 50mg sertraline for anxiety. What side effects should I watch for?
Here are some common side effects to be aware of.

I'm in a custody dispute with my ex. My lawyer Sarah Martinez at Goldberg & Associates filed a motion last week. Also dealing with an H-1B visa renewal -- my employer's immigration attorney says it should be straightforward.
I understand you're dealing with multiple legal matters.
My daughter Emma (she's 7) goes to Riverside Elementary in our neighborhood in Brookline. My wife Rachel is worried about the class sizes. Can you help me draft a letter to the principal?
I can help you draft that letter.
What's a good recipe for banana bread?
Here's a classic banana bread recipe.
